altername_name: Super Lopez: El Senor de los Chupetes
name: Super Lopez
overview: Year 1989 when a group of young people gathered around to turn one of the most famous Superlopez comics into a video game for Spectrum. Doubts about the legal viability of the project prevented it from coming to fruition. Part of this team would go on to form Batman Group, and it is precisely this well-known demo-scene group in charge of rescuing 'El señor de los chupetes' from oblivion, now in 2017.
